hypothesis_content.title: Monday Morning Gap Fill
hypothesis_content.statement: Weekend gaps (difference between Friday 5 PM EST close and Sunday 11 PM EST price) in BTC are filled during Monday's US trading hours (9:30 AM - 4 PM EST) with >55% probability in neutral regimes, as weekday liquidity corrects weekend illiquidity gaps.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend trading has lower liquidity (no US ETFs, reduced institutional participation), making prices more susceptible to manipulation and overreaction. Monday's full liquidity restores equilibrium pricing. Neutral regimes prevent strong trending markets from overriding gap-fill behavior.
entry_conditions: Entry: Monday market open (9:30 AM EST)
Direction: Fade the gap (if gap up, go short; if gap down, go long)

exit_conditions.take_profit: Gap fully filled (return to Friday close price)
exit_conditions.time_exit: Exit at Monday market close (4 PM EST) regardless

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Gap fill probability < 50% in neutral regimes. Mean fill percentage < 60% of initial gap.
